page.title: 20TREES & HEDGEROWS INCLUDE:-
page.content: Sycamore, Ash, English oak, Willow Alder,Silver birch, Rowan, Elder,Haw- thorn,Hazel, Blackthorn, Holly,Dog- wood,Wild rose, Honeysuckle,Black- berry, Guelder rose. Hedge-laying is expensive - most are mechanically trimmed, some saplings are left to mature. BRAILSFORD, Yeldersley Lane. Norfolk reed thatched cottages built approx. 45yrs ago for head gardener & water bailiff of Player family of Ednaston Manor. The head gardener, now retired lives with daughter who teaches at Brailsford C.E.(Controlled)Primary School. 5 children from area go to school, including 2 gypsy children. {Home Farm}& outbuildings were design- ed by Sir Edwin Lutyens and are being made into houses & flats.
